Summary: Object with 3 lights slowly flying northward with a flock of geese over Ketchikan, AK
divs: sighting detailsi arrived home at 10 pm. as i got out of my car i heard a flight of canadian geese flying northward. when i looked up, i saw 3 bright lights about 1000 feet above tongass narrows. there was a white light on top, a white light below, and a red light in the center. the lights were slowly flying along with the flock of geese. when i first saw the lights, i thought it was very out of the ordinary since small planes do not fly in our area after dark. i posted my sighting on my facebook page. the sighting was also reported by several facebook users. one person was able to take a photo with his iphone and posted it on facebook. i lost sight of the object when it and the geese passed in back of a hill. the fb photo shows white geese flying in formation and the bright lights of the ufo. my facebook page and description and photo is at: [link moved to fi section\cms\tg]
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Ketchikan
There was one other sighting in Ketchikan on or around April 28th 2012
